main event: A bright, round, white light was observed moving in a straight line, blinking on and off, then disappearing and reappearing over a period of 38 minutes on December 8, 1960, about 8 miles southwest of Seminole, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant white light, the size of a basketball,The sighting lasted approximately 38 minutes with multiple reports from ground observers,The weather was clear with no known aircraft in the area during the sighting,Some witnesses reported feeling frightened as they had never seen anything like it before,There were no sounds associated with the object, height estimation was 30-40 feet in diameter.
witness description: various citizens and military personnel in the area
